thread.title: All Immigration Brings Obligations With It

author: wsjcom
title: All Immigration Brings Obligations With It
text: It may be a bit overgenerous for Walter Russell Mead to attribute the elites’ support for immigration to economic and moral grounds (“Immigration Is Still Radioactive,” op-ed, Jan. 23). The fact is the Democrats are motivated by the quest for voters and are not too fussy about their legality. They caused the shutdown to benefit the Dreamers at the expense of the military and legal citizens. Those who are not unquestioningly supportive of immigration are described as “ugly nativists,” and it’s implied they are far less virtuous in their motives than the progressive elites. One doesn’t need to be an ugly nativist in Germany...
